listitem.para: statistical confidence level (%) as a string or the level of significance (alpha) as a decimal value, "95%", "99%" or 0.05, 0.01 resp (see examples).

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Performs the Pearson-Hartley outlier test. It should be used for distributions with more than 30 values.

important.para: Do use ST_pearsonhartley ONLY with NORMAL distrinutions and with more than 3 and less than 30 values! For more than 30 values use Pearson-Hartley test ""ST_pearsonhartley()"" instead.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: data = []; of = ST_pearsonhartley(data, "95%") // outlier-free values [of, o] = ST_pearsonhartley(data, "95%") // outlier and outlier-free values [of, o] = ST_pearsonhartley(data, 0.05) // outlier and outlier-free values
